<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get AWS Eventbridge configuration details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/audit_logs/v2/tenant/{tenantId}/aws_accounts/{accountId}/eventbridge_config"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns AWS Eventbridge configuration details for a given account
